entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 2 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
